rollback.title: Rollback Deployment

emergency.title: ⚠️ EMERGENCY ROLLBACK CONFIRMATION
emergency.criticalWarning: CRITICAL: This is an emergency rollback that bypasses all normal safety checks and approval workflows. This action is irreversible and will immediately rollback the deployment.
